document.masterDocTitle: Review of the genus Nysius Dallas from Mongolian Plateau (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Orsillidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the genus Nysius Dallas from Mongolian Plateau (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Orsillidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Diagnosis: The body color is yellowish brown.
Nysius ericae ericae
is very similar to
Nysius thymi thymi
in coloration and body size. It is distinguished from the latter by the end of the buccula is sharpened or somewhat blunt, and the first segment of the rostrum commonly exceeds or equal to the buccula. Inner projection of paramere with a broad concave and the blade obviously curved ( Fig. 10 ). Pygophore ( Fig. 15 ), spermatheca ( Fig. 20 ) and ejaculatory reservoir ( Fig. 25 ) as shown in the figures.

Measurements. Male. (n=10): Total length: 3.60–4.40 (4.00); head length: 0.72–0.79 (0.76); head width: 0.97–1.10 (1.01); interocular space: 0.59–0.62 (0.60); Antennal segments:? 0.30–0.32 (0.31),? 0.65–0.66 (0.6),? 0.54–0.55 (0.55),? 0.65–0.67 (0.65); pronotum length: 0.70–0.80 (0.76); pronotum width: 1.20–1.25 (1.23); scutellum length: 0.59–0.60 (0.59); scutellum width: 0.77–0.80 (0.78); claval commissure length; 0.53–0.56 (0.55); abdomen length: 2.10–2.50 (2.35); abdominal width: 0.80–1.30 (1.11).

Material examined.

Distribution. Inner Mongolia , China : Alxa League (Alxayouqi, Alxazuoqi, Ejinaqi), Bayannur League (Hangjinghouqi, Linhe District), Ordos City (Dongsheng District, Etuokeqianqi, Etuokeqi, Dalateqi, Wushenqi, Yijinhuoluoqi, Zhungeerqi), Baotou City ( Mt. Jiufeng , Tumoteyouqi, Daerhanmaoming anlianheqi), Hohhot City ( Tumotezuoqi , Helingeer county, Qingshuihe county , Saihan District), Wulanchabu City ( Liangcheng county , Zhuozi county, Qixiaying), Xilingol League (Zhengxiangbaiqi, Sonidzuoqi , Erlianhaote City, Zhenglanqi, Taipusiqi, Sonidyouqi, Dongwuzhumuqinq, Xiwuzhumuqinqi, Xilinhaote City), Chifeng city (Alukerqinqi, Balinyouqi, Keshiketengqi, Wengniuteqi, Hongshan District), Tongliao City (Huolinguole City, Keerqin district, Keerqinzuoyihouqi, Naimanqi), Hinggan (Aershan City, Keerqinyouyizhongqi, Wulanhaote City); Mongolia : Hovd , Dzavhan , Govi Altai, Arkhangai , Bayan hongan, Tuv , Umugovi, Dundgovi , Uvurkhangai; Elsewhere: China ( Ningxia , Beijing , Tianjin , Hebei , Shanxi , Henan , Sichuan , Guizhou , Xizang , Taiwan) , Asia, Europe, Africa, North America.

Notes. The previous distributional record in Hulunbuir of this species was referred to
Nysius thymi thymi
.
Nysius ericae groenlandicus
was reported from Inner Mongolia (Hohhot City, Chifeng City, Chifeng City, Baotou City, Tongliao City) according to the first segment of rostrum exceeding end of buccula (Nonnaizab, 1988). We have examined all these specimens and found the characters of parameres, pygophore, spermatheca and ejaculatory reservoir consistent with
Nysius ericae ericae
.
Nysius ericae groenlandicus
known previously from Inner Mongolia is referred to
Nysius ericae ericae .
The morphology of buccula of this species has intraspecific variation. The distal end sharp ( Fig. 7 ) or somewhat blunt ( Fig. 6 ), reaching the base of head ( Fig. 9 ) or not ( Fig. 8 ), the first segment of the rostrum equal to buccula ( Fig. 6 ) or longer than buccula ( Fig.7 ). These specimens parameres, pygophore, spermatheca and ejaculatory reservoir are all the same.
